sentences: Mul on suurt rõõmu sulle näha.
context: The word 'suurt' is the partitive singular form of the Estonian adjective 'suur', which means 'big', 'large', or 'great'. In this case, it appears to be used in an adverbial or modifying sense expressing a degree or quantity. The partitive case in Estonian often indicates partialness or indefiniteness when used with adjectives.
